title: Trade finance: Bills of lading
personalDataVerified: Shipper name, consignee name, carrier name, goods description, port of loading, port of discharge, B/L number
personalDataVisible: Delivery status (if cargo delivered). Link to carrier system (consignees and banks, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged bills of lading which are a major trade fraud vector. Domain binding verifies carrier legitimacy. Tamper-evident cargo documentation as title document. Title document verification for ownership transfer. Prevents trade finance fraud where fake BLs secure payment for non-existent cargo. ICC Uniform Rules compliance for documentary credits.
